name: The Entrance
description:
You are in a very dark room.  You notice that some faces are staring at
you from inside the walls.  In the middle of the room there is a small altar.
To the north there is a small round door.

exits.description: A beam of red light seeps through a hole in the door.

extra_descriptions.description:
This altar is very special.  Faces appear to be smiling from it.  There
is a triangle engraved in the top of it.

The triangle is filled with small symbols.  They seem to be a language
you have never seen before.
